dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Cease & Desist / DMCA Copyright Infringement Notice]
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

The URL in question is currently not accessible as of 3:13:42 p.m.
(GMT-6) on June 26, 2006 because it requires proprietary log-in
information to access it.

Legal Response Team
The Planet

-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf
Of Policy Enforcement
Posted At: Monday, June 26, 2006 1:15 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Cease & Desist / DMCA Copyright Infringement
Notice]
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Cease & Desist / DMCA Copyright Infringement
Notice]




-------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] Cease & Desist / DMCA Copyright Infringement
Notice
Date:         Sat, 24 Jun 2006 19:25:51 -0700 (PDT)
From:         Ron Wainscott <ron@ronwainscottphotography.com>
To:         whois@swelldeal.com, abuse@theplanet.com,
copyright@theplanet.com,
legal@theplanet.com, webinfo@swelldeal.com



I am the photographer and copyright owner of all images contained on the
website http://www.dawnavril.com

Attached is a DMCA complaint in regards to the website
http://www.uselessjunk.net using my copyrighted images without
permission.

Ron Wainscott Photography does not tolerate copyright infringement and
will prosecute anyone involved in this illegal activity (including the
host of the site) to the fullest extent of the law.

It would be in your best interest to remove the link mentioned in the
attached complaint as well as any other images from DawnAvril.com
immediately.  Failure to do so will result in copyright infringement
charges being filed against anyone and everyone involved with the
operation of uselessjunk.net.  Your immediate attention to this matter
is required.

Ron Wainscott
(251) 967-4226

Ron Wainscott Photography
P.O. Box 4766
Gulf Shores, AL 36547
(251) 967-4226


I am writing to demand removal of the following page from your website:
 
 http://www.uselessjunk.net/viewtopic.php?t=150081&highlight=dawn
 
The images being used on this page are owned by me.  You DID NOT obtain my permission to use them.  Therefore, this is a violation of the DMCA Act.  If you continues to use these images without my permission, I am prepared to file Copyright Infringement charges.  If action is not taken by Monday June 26, 2006 legal action will be taken.  
 

The content in question was illegally downloaded from http://www.dawnavril.com.  All material contained on dawnavril.com is owned by me and is not to be re-used or re-published without the express written consent of Ron Wainscott Photography.
 
The infringing material is located at:
 
http://www.uselessjunk.net/viewtopic.php?t=150081&highlight=dawn
I am the rightful owner of the images being used on the page listed above.  You may contact me at:
 
Ron Wainscott Photography
 
P.O. Box 4766
 
Gulf Shores, AL 36547
 
(251) 967-4226
 
ron@ronwainscottphotography.com
 
I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
 
I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
 
Ron Wainscott
 
(251) 967-4226
 
ron@ronwainscottphotography.com
